channel.title: Run() method... HELP PLEASE (Removing Thread Per Client problem)
channel.description: I need to know where my run() method ends in my client class. I'm really confused because it seems to like.. never end and I apparently need to move everything in it to IOClient.java under the process() for the "Remove Thread Per Client" tutorial. It messed up my server (I backed it up, don't worry, I'm not stupid) but I followed everything correctly. If you want to see my errors, ask and I'll post them. Thanks. :)

item.title: Run() method... HELP PLEASE (Removing Thread Per Client problem)
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Here’s my error:

Starting server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1519 LoginPacket size: 86, RSA packet size: 46 Client type: high memory version dataFileVersion[0]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[1]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[2]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[3]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[4]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[5]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[6]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[7]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[8]: 0x0 UserId: 34351087 Ident: Billthgthtyi:1798928419 inStreamSessionKey[0]: 0x5dbedba inStreamSessionKey[1]: 0x2c59311 inStreamSessionKey[2]: 0x3c6557a inStreamSessionKey[3]: 0x2584d18 outStreamSessionKey[0]: 0x5dbedec outStreamSessionKey[1]: 0x2c59343 outStreamSessionKey[2]: 0x3c655ac outStreamSessionKey[3]: 0x2584d4a Did not save for Billthgthtyi ClientHandler: Client Billthgthtyi disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1520 LoginPacket size: 86, RSA packet size: 46 Client type: high memory version dataFileVersion[0]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[1]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[2]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[3]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[4]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[5]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[6]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[7]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[8]: 0x0 UserId: 34351087 Ident: Billthgthtyi:1798928419 inStreamSessionKey[0]: 0x15654ca inStreamSessionKey[1]: 0x386e17f inStreamSessionKey[2]: 0x2a3bf7b inStreamSessionKey[3]: 0x5d07020 outStreamSessionKey[0]: 0x15654fc outStreamSessionKey[1]: 0x386e1b1 outStreamSessionKey[2]: 0x2a3bfad outStreamSessionKey[3]: 0x5d07052 Did not save for Billthgthtyi ClientHandler: Client Billthgthtyi disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1521 LoginPacket size: 86, RSA packet size: 46 Client type: high memory version dataFileVersion[0]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[1]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[2]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[3]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[4]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[5]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[6]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[7]: 0x0 dataFileVersion[8]: 0x0 UserId: 34351087 Ident: Billthgthtyi:1798928419 inStreamSessionKey[0]: 0x1bfc9e0 inStreamSessionKey[1]: 0xcff40e inStreamSessionKey[2]: 0x57aac13 inStreamSessionKey[3]: 0x22f526c outStreamSessionKey[0]: 0x1bfca12 outStreamSessionKey[1]: 0xcff440 outStreamSessionKey[2]: 0x57aac45 outStreamSessionKey[3]: 0x22f529e Did not save for Billthgthtyi ClientHandler: Client Billthgthtyi disconnected. ClientHandler: Rejected from localhost:1522

It doesn’t open my Control Pannel anymore, my friends list doesn’t work, and it kills you when you log in for the first time. Some people have had that error, along with the login kill glitch. If you used that tutorial, do you know what’s wrong?

Read full topic

item.title: Run() method... HELP PLEASE (Removing Thread Per Client problem)
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

xx qwertyuiop xx:

Yeah, that’s the one.

You can also push Alt+Delete (I think) and it removes the method after checking for it’s usages.

runefreak10:

So what am I supposed to do…?

Remove the method?
